dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion Request
dataDeletion.subtitle: Request deletion of your personal data from Rizko.ai
dataDeletion.privacyRightsDescription: Under GDPR, CCPA, and other privacy regulations, you have the right to request deletion of your personal data. We will process your request within 30 days.
dataDeletion.whatGetsDeletedDescription: Upon processing your request, we will permanently delete:
dataDeletion.deleteOAuthData: Connected social media account data and OAuth tokens
dataDeletion.deleteSavedData: Saved videos, analytics history, and preferences
dataDeletion.retentionNote: Some data may be retained for legal or compliance purposes (e.g., payment records for tax purposes). This retained data will be anonymized where possible.
dataDeletion.submitRequestDescription: Enter the email address associated with your Rizko.ai account
dataDeletion.consentNotice: By submitting this request, you confirm that you are the owner of this account and understand that this action is irreversible.
dataDeletion.confirmationEmailSent: We've received your data deletion request. You will receive a confirmation email at {{email}}.
dataDeletion.saveCode: Please save this code for your records
dataDeletion.processedWithin30Days: Your request will be processed within 30 days
dataDeletion.emailConfirmation: You will receive email confirmation when deletion is complete
dataDeletion.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.
dataDeletion.emailRequestDescription: Send an email to <1>privacy@rizko.ai</1> with subject "Data Deletion Request" and include your account email.
dataDeletion.selfServiceDescription: If you can access your account, go to <1>Settings -> Account -> Delete Account</1>
dataDeletion.instagramMetaDescription: If you connected your Instagram account and want to delete data through Meta's system, you can also use the Data Deletion callback that Meta provides. When you disconnect Rizko.ai from your Instagram settings, we automatically receive a deletion callback and process your data removal.
